sense.gloss: to be clear (of a sight, sound, colour, etc.), to be bright, to be vivid, to be crisp
to be clear-headed, to be alert, to be on the ball, to be wide awake
to look upbeat, to be perky, to be cheerful
to master (a skill), to excel at, to cleanly execute
to become frigid, to become intensely cold
to clear gradually, to get cold gradually
to be clear, to be distinct, to be precise
to be skillful, to be skilful, to be deft
to get cold, to freeze over
to be keenly cold, to be cold and clear
to be wide-awake, to be wakeful, to be unable to sleep
to be clear-headed, to be brainy
x: 頭がさえる・あたまがさえる

sdata.j: そのパフォーマンスは↑冴↑↓さ↓えないものでしたよ。
コーヒーを↑一杯↑↓いっぱい↓↑飲↑↓の↓むと↑頭↑↓あたま↓が↑冴↑↓さ↓える。
sdata.e: I feel more alert after drinking a cup of coffee.

sdata.j: ↑昨日↑↓きのう↓ゆっくり↑休↑↓やす↓んだ↑分↑↓ぶん↓、↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑頭↑↓あたま↓が↑冴↑↓さ↓えている。
sdata.e: I feel smart today, to a degree that is in proportion to the amount of good rest I had yesterday.

sdata.j: なんだか↑目↑↓め↓が↑冴↑↓さ↓えちゃって、↑眠↑↓ねむ↓れなくなっちゃった。
sdata.e: For some reason, I'm wide awake and can't fall asleep.

sdata.j: もう↑午前↑↓ごぜん↓↑3↑↓さん↓↑時↑↓じ↓だけど、↑目↑↓め↓が↑冴↑↓さ↓えて↑眠↑↓ねむ↓れる↑気↑↓き↓がしない。
sdata.e: It's already 3 a.m., but I'm wide awake and couldn't fall asleep if I tried.

sdata.j: ↑気分↑↓きぶん↓が↑冴↑↓さ↓えないな。
まだ↑気分↑↓きぶん↓が↑冴↑↓さ↓えないの？
sdata.e: Are you still not feeling well?

sdata.j: ↑寝起↑↓ねお↓きの↑冴↑↓さ↓えない↑頭↑↓あたま↓でトムは↑必死↑↓ひっし↓に↑考↑↓かんが↓えたが、↑何↑↓なに↓もいいアイデアは↑浮↑↓う↓かばなかった。
sdata.e: With his sleep-ridden brain, Tom thought desperately, but couldn't come up with any good ideas.
